title: Covering ALL The Headlines (ft: Mitch Trubisky)
description:
It's BIG news Tuesday! And with that, Adam dissects all the major headlines of the day including: the blockbuster trade involving QB Russell Wilson, where Deshaun Watson will go, and more! Then, Adam is joined by soon to be unrestricted free agent Mitchell Trubisky, who talks about which team he might be calling home. Adam wraps up with more news and notes; plus a fun travel story from the NFL Combine.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
